entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@Surgeon_General @WhiteHouse After you said that #Trump was in better shape than you, it's hard to believe anything you say  You talk about Trump like he's Kim Jong-il

You were USSG when Trump said #COVID19 was a hoax.  If you didn't tell him a pandemic was coming, that's another reason not to listen
